message:
Breaking News............... Breaking News........................

Prithibir prothom "AWAMI SUNNI MOSJID" sthapon....

Vienna, Austria. Akhane kotipoy namdhari muslim awamileague sommilito vabe "AWAMI SUNNI MOSJID" sthaponer sidhdhanto niache. Jodio bortomane 4ti mosjid royeche. ukto mosjid-er Imam gon Bangladeshe Aleem.ulamader upor nirjaton nia musullider sathe kotha bolai tader biruddhe babostha newar kothao shona jachche.

From : Vienna, Austria.
Fan post
